channel.title: User-Controller Encryption on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in User-Controller Encryption on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: New Perspectives on the Future of Encryption
item.description: Authors: Baker, Jim and Landau, Susan Published: May 2019 URL: https://www.lawfareblog.com/new-perspectives-future-encryption Tags: 2010s Academic Think Tank User-Controller Encryption Abstract: Encryption and its effects on law enforcement’s access to data seem to occupy a perennial place in the headlines (and on Lawfare as well). The two of us have been working on it for years. The subject is often highly contested, but the fierce discussion has ignored some critical factors.

item.title: The Way Forward: Working Together to Tackle Cybercrime
item.description: Authors: Wray, Christopher Published: July 2019 URL: https://www.fbi.gov/news/speeches/the-way-forward-working-together-to-tackle-cybercrime Tags: 2010s FBI Law Enforcement User-Controller Encryption Abstract: FBI Director Christopher Wray’s remarks at the Fordham University - FBI International Conference on Cyber Security, New York City, New York
